Enum CopyOption

extends Enum<CopyOption>

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      COPY_ATTRIBUTES
      Copy attributes to the new file.
      RECURSIVE
      Copy directories recursively.
      REPLACE_EXISTING
      Replace an existing file if it exists.

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • COPY_ATTRIBUTES

        public static final CopyOption COPY_ATTRIBUTES
        Copy attributes to the new file.

      • REPLACE_EXISTING

        public static final CopyOption REPLACE_EXISTING
        Replace an existing file if it exists.

      • RECURSIVE

        public static final CopyOption RECURSIVE
        Copy directories recursively. By default only the directory itself is copied, not its contents. Will not follow symlinks, if symlinks are detectable by the adaptor.
